original_text: And the Lord spoke to Moses in the wilderness of Sinai, in the first month of the second year after they had come out of the land of Egypt, saying,
korean_text: 애굽 땅에서 나온 다음 해 첫째 달에 여호와께서 시내 광야에서 모세에게 말씀하여 이르시되

sentences.original_text: And the Lord spoke to Moses
in the first month of the second year
after they had come out of the land of Egypt
